channel.title: Variable error
channel.description:
I keep getting this error i kinda see the problem but not sure on how to go about fixing it.
http://i.imgur.com/SFRXr87.png
http://i.imgur.com/fNmr3nO.png

item.title: Variable error
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:4, topic:551366”]Do you not have something else in your itemdef class that you can determine yourself what to use? I already told you what to do, which was finding the correct symbol to use (which you obviously haven’t in this case). It really depends on your client.

Some use “itemDef.actions” Check to see if using that solves your problem.[/quote]

Appreciate the help! that worked perfectly

Read full topic

item.title: Variable error
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Do you not have something else in your itemdef class that you can determine yourself what to use? I already told you what to do, which was finding the correct symbol to use (which you obviously haven’t in this case). It really depends on your client.

Some use “itemDef.actions” Check to see if using that solves your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Variable error
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

Welliton_inc:

your client is stating that it cannot find the symbol “itemActions”. Now I don’t know much about renamed clients but i’m sure it uses something else.

I know that’s what its stating, i need to know how to fix it…

Read full topic
